item.title: Predicting Test Scores using Linear Regression
item.description: Introduction Getting the Data Data Visualization Linear Regression Results from creating model of Instructional Expenditures versus Test Score of certain type Model Comparison Multiple Linear Regression Both Tests Deciding on a Model Linear Model Selection Steps Using Best Subset Method Using All Possible Models Method Visualization of the Final Model Selected Final Thoughts on Model Selected Predictive Checks for the Model Visualizing Simulations from the Model Generating Multiple Predictive Checks Final Thoughts Introduction The data used for this project is from the Urban Instituteâ€™s API which is widely used as an education data explorer.
